original_text: God is able to forgive all the wrong things that people do, and the bad things that they say against other people. But God will never forgive people who say bad things against the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 이르노니 사람에 대한 모든 죄와 모독은 사하심을 얻되 성령을 모독하는 것은 사하심을 얻지 못하겠고

sentences.original_text: God is able to forgive all the wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 잘못된 것들을 용서하실 수 있으시며

sentences.original_text: and the bad things that they say against other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 사람들을 향해 말하는 나쁜 것들도

sentences.original_text: But God will never forgive people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님은 결코 용서하지 않으실 것인데

sentences.original_text: who say bad things against the Holy Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 성령님을 거슬러 나쁜 말을 하는 사람들을
